# Ward Perry

Ward Perry (born March 20, 1970) is a Canadian voice actor and ADR script writer who has voiced characters for a number of anime dubbed in Vancouver, British Columbia, Canada. He is mostly known as the voice actor of Dragon Ball Z villain Dr. Wheelo, Rowen of the Strata in Ronin Warriors, Geese Howard in the Fatal Fury animations, Scavenger in Transformers: Armada, and the first Voice of Landmine Transformers: Energon. He retired in 2009 and has not made any new appearances on television since.
